title: What do i do? D: Store bug! Need help!
body:
I usually play on the desktop but today went to a friends and used my laptop instead, and for some reason the in-game store goes off the page as seen in the picture, and so the sell and undo buttons are in-accecesable for the whole game, which unfortunately meant i was unable to sell my dorans blade and health potion for the whole game... which seriously impacted my power as the ADC... having 2 items down...
i had almost 5000 by the end of the game and still had a green potion and dorans...

I tried exiting and reopening the store, i tried moving it about and scrolling and everything, but i just could not access those much needed buttons.

what do i do?

this is a BIG bug, it means i cant start the game with any starting items or buy any re-fillable potions because i cant get rid of them, it also means that if i accidentally buy the same item twice, I'm screwed.

replies.body: just change your resolution or temp swap to borderless should fix it
